channel.title: init on Documentation Spiral Code Studio
channel.description: Recent content in init on Documentation Spiral Code Studio

item.title: defaultEngine
item.description: event.defaultEngine Type String Event init Platform Android See also init texttospeech.* Overview The identifier of the default engine.

item.title: engines
item.description: event.engines Type Table Event init Platform Android See also init texttospeech.* Overview The list of available engines. Keys are engine names, values are engine identifiers. Sample output { ['Google Text-to-speech Engine'] = 'com.google.android.tts', ['Pico TTS'] = 'com.svox.pico' }

item.title: errorCode
item.description: event.errorCode Type Number Event init See also init texttospeech.* Overview Unique error code, present when event.isError is true, nil otherwise.

item.title: errorMessage
item.description: event.errorMessage Type String Event init See also init texttospeech.* Overview String description of an error when event.isError is true, nil otherwise.

item.title: isError
item.description: event.isError Type Boolean Event init See also init texttospeech.* Overview Boolean of true in case of an error.

item.title: maxLength
item.description: event.maxLength Type Integer Event init Platform Android 4.3+ See also init texttospeech.* Overview The maximum length of the text that can be passed to the speech engine.

item.title: name
item.description: event.name Type String Event init See also init texttospeech.* Overview The string "init".
